statements: DELETE FROM inventory_levels WHERE product_id = 100 AND current_stock < 10;
DELETE FROM inventory_levels WHERE product_name = 'Widget' AND reorder_point > 20;
DELETE FROM inventory WHERE product_id IN (SELECT product_id FROM stockouts WHERE reason = 'Damaged' ORDER BY stockout_date DESC);
DELETE FROM stockout_events WHERE event_id = 5 AND resolved_date IS NULL;
DELETE FROM inventory WHERE id = 101 AND quantity < 5;
DELETE FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name = 'ABC Company';
DELETE FROM InventoryLevel WHERE location = 'Warehouse A';
DELETE FROM InventoryLevel WHERE id = 101 AND location = 'Warehouse A'
